item.title: Terms for being alive or not quite dead
item.summary: A short piece describing the different states of being alive, or not 'quite' not dead, or 'quickly dead'.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-11
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: terms for being alive and dead
used by the !kun for being alive and dead
